title: How to Unshrink Cotton Pants

steps.headline: Get a sponge and soak it in vinegar.
Apply the vinegar to the pants/shirt.
steps.description: Cover every single inch of the pants/shirt. This is very important. Try no to skip a spot.

steps.headline: Grab the airtight container.
steps.description: Put the pants/shirt in the container. Put the lid on.

steps.headline: Put the container in a relatively warm area.
steps.description: You could try putting it near a heating vent. This will activate the vinegar and expand your pants/shirt.

steps.headline: After about a half an hour, remove the pants/shirt from the container.
steps.description: Put the pants/shirt in the washer and make sure you add detergent. This will remove the vinegar from the article of clothing.

steps.headline: Dry the pants/shirt for about and hour in the dryer.
Pull your pants/shirt out and try them on.
steps.description: If they are still to small, repeat the process! You should have a perfectly sized pair of pants in no time!

text: Get a sponge and soak it in vinegar.  Apply the vinegar to the pants/shirt. Cover every single inch of the pants/shirt. This is very important. Try no to skip a spot. Grab the airtight container. Put the pants/shirt in the container. Put the lid on. Put the container in a relatively warm area. You could try putting it near a heating vent. This will activate the vinegar and expand your pants/shirt. After about a half an hour, remove the pants/shirt from the container. Put the pants/shirt in the washer and make sure you add detergent. This will remove the vinegar from the article of clothing. Dry the pants/shirt for about and hour in the dryer.  Pull your pants/shirt out and try them on. If they are still to small, repeat the process! You should have a perfectly sized pair of pants in no time!
